rooms.defaultTopic:
{$1}'s Private Room - Open up the channel topic for more information.


What to do with my room?:
 - Invite other members with **{$3}room invite**
 - kick invited members with **{$4}room kick**
 - change the room with **{$5}room set**

This room was created on **{$2}**
